tags: appreciate tony for the hero he is 2k19
summary: Tony Stark because he's someone that's willing to admit when he's wrong and learn from his mistakes.
question: Tony Stark because he's someone that's willing to admit when he's wrong and learn from his mistakes.
answer:
MY MAN.

MY BRAVE SELFLESS MAN.

Tony Stark is literally one of the only characters in the Marvel Universe that openly owns his mistakes and has paid for them repeatedly.

Every time I think about the other Avengers accusing him of being nothing or selfish or uncaring, I get far too furious.

There’s a reason he’s the bloody face of the entire MCU, and it’s because he really does represent what it means to be hero. Someone who isn’t infallible or perfect, but a human with a heart of gold, who’s powerful and vulnerable all at once.

spread a bit of love! send me your fav character + why?

summary: Male OC who is an emotionally detached asshole (and probably an alcoholic), but is always right about everything and is gifted...
body: Male OC who is an emotionally detached asshole (and probably an alcoholic), but is always right about everything and is gifted in one particular area of expertise, and has issues with the women in his life who lecture him at length about his deepest psychological flaws, are worse than any Mary-Sue and I am not backing down on that.

reblog.comment: Male OC who is an emotionally detached asshole (and probably an alcoholic), but is always right about everything and is gifted in one particular area of expertise, and has issues with the women in his life who lecture him at length about his deepest psychological flaws, are worse than any Mary-Sue and I am not backing down on that.

summary:
Tony: Oh, come on, Rhodey! I wasn’t that drunk.
Rhodey: You were following Peter around saying how you had to keep him...
body:
Tony: Oh, come on, Rhodey! I wasn’t that drunk.

Rhodey: You were following Peter around saying how you had to keep him safe.

Tony: So, what? He’s my son.

Rhodey: You asked Peter if you could adopt him.

Tony:

Rhodey: And then you cried when he said no.

Tony: So, what? He’s my son.

tags: original: orange is the new black
summary:
Tony: No such fucking word as 'knifes'.
Steve: No? Then what does Tony do to Bernardo in West Side Story? I'll tell you. He...
body:
Tony: No such fucking word as ‘knifes’.

Steve: No? Then what does Tony do to Bernardo in West Side Story? I’ll tell you. He knifes him.

Tony: Well, aren’t you the plot spoiler.

reblog.comment:
Tony: No such fucking word as ‘knifes’.

Steve: No? Then what does Tony do to Bernardo in West Side Story? I’ll tell you. He knifes him.

Tony: Well, aren’t you the plot spoiler.

trail.content_raw:
Tony: No such fucking word as ‘knifes’.

Tony: Well, aren’t you the plot spoiler.
trail.content:
Tony: No such fucking word as ‘knifes’.

Steve: No? Then what does Tony do to Bernardo in West Side Story? I’ll tell you. He knifes him.

Tony: Well, aren’t you the plot spoiler.

title: Red Sky Reality (Book Two)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2RNGBpP

by Lone_Wolf_Fanfics

Trixie and Loki’s relationship is blossoming.

When the Convergence begins Trixie recovers some of her lost memories, specifically the ones surrounding the events of Thor: Dark World. With her help, Loki and Thor set out to save Jane Foster, Frigga and Asgard as well as retrieve the Reality Stone before it’s too late.

Words: 929, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Trix Winchester Series

  • Fandoms: Supernatural, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Avengers (Comics), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Marvel (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply

When the Convergence begins Trixie recovers some of her lost memories, specifically the ones surrounding the events of Thor: Dark World. With her help, Loki and Thor set out to save Jane Foster, Frigga and Asgard as well as retrieve the Reality Stone before it’s too late.

summary: wish you were here
title: wish you were here
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FZVJcB

by JBS_Forever

“You stay,” Tony says, as if it’s that easy, as if Peter’s entire life hasn’t been ripped out from under his feet.

“You stay and we fight,” he says, as if Peter isn’t already gone.
